kr.neolab.sdk.pen

Interface IPenCtrl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PenCtrl

    public interface IPenCtrl
    The interface that provides the functionality of a pen
    Author:
    CHY

      • reqOfflineData

        void reqOfflineData(int sectionId,
                    int ownerId,
                    int noteId)
        The pen is stored in an offline transfer of data requested. (Please note that this function is not synchronized. If multiple threads concurrently try to run this function, explicit synchronization must be done externally.)
        Parameters:
        sectionId - section id of note
        ownerId - owner id of note
        noteId - of note
